mapper.select: SELECT REVIEWNUM, PRODUCTNUM, ID, REVIEWRATE, REVIEWCONTENTS, REVIEWDATE FROM REVIEW ORDER BY REVIEWNUM
mapper.update: UPDATE REVIEW SET ID = #{id}, REVIEWRATE=#{reviewRate}, REVIEWCONTENTS=#{reviewContents}, REVIEWDATE=SYSDATE WHERE REVIEWNUM = #{reviewNum}
mapper.select: SELECT REVIEWNUM, PRODUCTNUM, ID, REVIEWRATE, REVIEWCONTENTS, REVIEWDATE FROM REVIEW ORDER BY REVIEWNUM DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REVIEWFILE(FILENUM, REVIEWNUM, FILENAME, ORIGINALNAME) VALUES (FILE_SEQ.NEXTVAL,#{reviewNum}, #{fileName}, #{originalName} )
mapper.select: SELECT FILENUM, FILENAME, ORIGINALNAME FROM REVIEWFILE WHERE FILENUM=#{fileNum}
